attributes.action: Get the british army together and fight Islamic state!!
attributes.additional_details: Islamic state need to be sorted. They behead people. Kill innocent people, including british citizens, they are wanting a war and soon enough that could happen, they need stopping!
attributes.background: The Islamic state are getting too much, nobody is doing anything about it and something needs to be done before its too late. The only way these barbaric people will stop their disgusting killings is if they get it back! We cannot sit back and keep letting innocent people die. British people too!

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/107116

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
